creator: peter.harrison@nothingbutnet.co.nz
text:
A JNDI database resource defined in <GlobalResources> or <DefaultContext> cannot
be found at runtime, while resources defined in a <Context> that are identical
can be found. This was noted when attempting to upgrade from 4.0.4 to 4.1.27, so
the issue must be introduced somewhere between these code bases.

This is a continuing issue for people on the list - and since it is preventing
me from deploying the latest code I've marked it as a 'critical' - appologies if
this is presumptuious. There is no know work around yet.

This is a duplicate of bugs:
- 2454 (http://nagoya.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=24545) and 
- 16316 (http://nagoya.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=16316)

See also
http://www.mail-archive.com/tomcat-user@jakarta.apache.org/msg110077.html for
the message that helped me get round this.


*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 16316 ***
